price: Eğer yüz çevirirseniz bilin ki, ben sizden bir ecir istememiştim. Benim ecrim sadece Allah’a aittir. Ben müslümanlardan olmakla emrolundum.
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّيۡتُمۡ فَمَا سَأَلۡتُكُم مِّنۡ أَجۡرٍۖ إِنۡ أَجۡرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱللَّهِۖ وَأُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaytum famā sa-altukum min ajrin in ajriya illā ʿalā al-lahi wa-umir'tu an akūna mina al-mus'limīna
